settings.accordion_name_p:
There are many causes of hair loss), but the most common type is male pattern baldness.

Despite what you might’ve heard—hats cause hair loss, shampooing too much causes hair loss, masturbation causes hair loss—hair loss isn’t caused by anything that you’re doing now. And that’s because male pattern baldness is a genetic trait (so you can blame Mom and Dad).

If you’d like to stop your hair loss, we recommend checking out our treatment options to learn more.

settings.heading_text_inner: Please text or call us at (833) 745-3377, chat us, or email us at help@YatesMD.com.
